Sitting in Edinburgh airport waiting for a delayed plane to London as we return full time with no social distancing or compulsory mask wearing at a Westminster about to be hit with a COVID case upturn. Somehow they think this makes sense and is a good use of our time…

@jengerson @SunshineRulez It’s getting scary. I had to show papers to sit on a plane last weekend. I was so upset I made a frownie-face. Of course you couldn’t see it because they also forced me to wear a mask!  The tyranny!

"Uh you cant weat that neck gaitoe on the plane you are going to have to get off the plane and change it if you even have another one" 

Me "Hah. No. Puts other mask over gaitor then pulls gaitor down. Ez as pie" -walks away- 

Gets stared at by dumb these whores.

Surely chewing tobacco isn't a sufficient reason to justify taking off your mask on a plane. 

Not to mention the fact that you're then spitting your Covid into a bottle next to me. 

Gross during normal times. Worse now. 

Thoughts @AmericanAir ?
I can't believe the captain on the plane has to tell people that they are allowed to take their mask off if the plane loses pressure in favour of oxygen masks.
Every time I eat pretzels on a plane and am allowed to momentarily remove my mask I feel like Andy Dufresne surreptitiously playing the record in the wardens office and imagining being a free man

@RabbiRuth Double mask, board early and head to the back of the plane (if not assigned seat) so other passengers don’t have to all walk past you. Otherwise try to board last. And don’t eat or drink so mask stays on.

@RabbiRuth N95 or best mask you can get. Sanitizer wipes. Don't eat or drink on plane (so you don't have to remove mask).

So I’ve had a week in Croatia without wearing a mask.
Not on the plane, not on the ferries, not in shops or in taxis.
Not at the breakfast buffet, not at the bar.
It is possible.
I was asked once, in a shop in Dubrovnik, but just went elsewhere.
Don’t let them steal your 🌍
